entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
